author: Staff Reporter
text:
A two-day exhibition and sale of designer clothing and home decors began at The Hotel Residency on Avanashi Road on Saturday. According to a release, the expo on Sunday will be from 10.30 a.m. to 8 p.m.

For details: call 98865 20560 or visit sanctumoffashion@

gmail.com or

http://m.facebook.com/

sanctum2015/

?ref=bookmarks
title: Two-day expo
